line_1: When call'd on to order the fun'ral direction,
line_2: But Queen N**********, of a diff'rent complexion,

line_1: But thought it sufficient to give her Direction,
line_2: Without being coddled to mend her Complexion:

line_1: Tell them wha hae the chief direction,
line_2: Scotland an' me's in great affliction,

line_1: Tell them wha hae the chief direction,
line_2: E'er sin' they laid that curst restriction

line_1: Tell them wha hae the chief direction,
line_2: An' rouse them up to strong conviction,
